summary: Comprehensive testing of DJ Schedule feature - Admin dashboard DJ Schedule tab and backend APIs fully working. All 19 backend tests passed (100%). Admin panel DJ Schedule UI verified working. Location detail page DJ LIVE banner code implementation verified correct.
critical_code_review_comments: DJ Schedule feature fully implemented - admin can create DJ profiles with name, stage name, emoji, bio, payment methods
Admin can create/edit/delete DJ schedules with location, date, time, recurring options, and notes
Public endpoints correctly return upcoming schedules filtered by date
/api/dj/at-location/{slug} returns currently live DJ when checked in
LocationDetailPage.jsx correctly shows DJ LIVE banner with pulsing green animation when DJ is live
Upcoming DJs section shows when no DJ is live but schedules exist, displays up to 3 performances
Tip DJ button navigates to DJ tipping tab as expected

success_rate.frontend: Admin panel verified working via Playwright

seed_data_creation: DJ Mike (ID: 57cae364-b31f-4920-909f-fda18fc78fe6) is checked in at edgewood-atlanta. Schedules exist for Mar 1 (Edgewood - Hip Hop Night) and Feb 28 (Midtown - R&B Night)
context_for_next_testing_agent: DJ Schedule feature is fully functional. Backend APIs tested: /api/dj/schedules, /api/dj/schedules/location/{slug}, /api/dj/at-location/{slug}, /api/admin/dj/profiles (CRUD), /api/admin/dj/schedules (CRUD). Admin panel DJ Schedule tab accessible via data-testid='tab-dj-schedule'. DJ MIKE is currently live at edgewood-atlanta for testing DJ LIVE banner.

Admin DJ Schedule tab visibility.details: DJ Schedule tab visible in admin panel navigation

Admin create DJ profile.details: POST /api/admin/dj/profiles creates DJ with name, stage_name, avatar_emoji, bio, payment methods

Admin delete DJ profile.details: DELETE /api/admin/dj/profiles/{id} removes profile and associated schedules

Admin create DJ schedule.details: POST /api/admin/dj/schedules creates schedule with DJ/location names auto-populated

Admin edit DJ schedule.details: PUT /api/admin/dj/schedules/{id} updates schedule, refreshes DJ/location names if changed

Public /api/dj/schedules.details: Returns all upcoming schedules (active, future date or recurring)

Public /api/dj/at-location/{slug}.details: Returns DJ profile when checked in at location, null otherwise

DJ LIVE banner implementation.details: LocationDetailPage.jsx lines 1490-1520: Shows banner when currentDJ truthy, has pulsing green dot, Tip DJ button with data-testid

Upcoming DJs section implementation.details: LocationDetailPage.jsx lines 1522-1562: Shows when no live DJ but schedules exist, displays up to 3 performances with date/time/notes

Authentication security.details: All admin DJ endpoints require authentication (return 403 without token)
